title: Average U.S. brand response rate on social media 2017 , by vertical
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Average response rate in each Month on the y axis.
Month Utilities has the highest Average response rate and Media/Entertainment has the lowest Average response rate.
The difference of Average response rate between the highest and lowest Month is 12.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average response rate for 15 number of Months.
Month Utilities has the highest Average response rate and Media/Entertainment has the lowest Average response rate.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Average response rate in each Month on the y axis.
Month Utilities has the highest Average response rate and Media/Entertainment has the lowest Average response rate.
The difference of Average response rate between the highest and lowest Month is 12.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Average response rate in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Average response rate 18.0 is found at Month Utilities and the minimum is found at Media/Entertainment where Month is 6.0.
The second highest Average response rate is appeared to be the Month .
There is a difference of 12.0 between the maximum Month Utilities and minimum Month Media/Entertainment.
Month Utilities is higher than any other Months with value 18.0, followed by , and Consumer Goods. Down to Month Media/Entertainment with the lowest value 6.0.
Overall Average response rate has declined over the Months.
Month Internet/Technology, Marketing/Advertising, and Automotive share the same value 11.0.
The average Average response rate in all 15 Months is 10.8.
The Average response rate is 162.0 if we add up values of all Months.
